attributes.action: Introduce an emergency agreement to cap interest rates from banks and credit card companies to 2% above the base rate. Banks are holding rates high to rebuild their balances slowing up recovery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce an emergency agreement to cap interest rates from banks and credit card companies to 2% above the base rate. Banks are holding rates high to rebuild their balances slowing up recovery. This is reducing capital flow in high streets and other markets costing jobs and helped to cause the longest recession in modern times. The banks are ruining the governments attempts to end this recession and they are holding the country to ransom!
